item.title: Customer Segmentation
item.description: Why it matters? Customer segmentation nowadays is a basic tool of any bank, you want to classify your customers naturally and understand how cluster shift and evolve in time. It customer cluster needs to be treated in a different way from multiple angles: Channels: Is a tech savvy customer? Or it is easier to call him? Is he suing tech but still going to the branch and we should advise him on more efficient ways to do his transactions?
